subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Victor Cruz, a second-year player best known for putting up gaudy statistics in the preseason, delivered the biggest plays in the Giants’ win over the Eagles, who lost Michael Vick to a broken right hand.
snippet: Victor Cruz, a second-year player best known for putting up gaudy statistics in the preseason, delivered the biggest plays in the Giants’ win over the Eagles, who lost Michael Vick to a broken right hand.
